title: Where can I find some really good modern music? - Quora

response.answer_text: Well Music is something that you need to explore because everyone has different taste. And if you don't know where to look , you can check out this website - SoundCloud. It offers some really nice tracks which you can listen to online and it even offers a mobile app.I just started using this and have found some really cool tracks. Also, this is what I usually do in the mornings, turn on the tv and find a good music channel.They play most of the latest hits and are a good source to find good , popular music. For me it's Vh1. Hope it helps!
There is a suitable app called Sound cloud
